name: Create new rows in Google Sheets spreadsheets from new one time sales in Plug&Paid
description:
Every time a new one time sale is created in Plug&Paid, a new row will be added into a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1P44GQfVt12PWj9SnZ-51IbLcrjJzzmQrItjyp49N8Lc/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as the destination for the Plug&Paid order data. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.
